title: Drawing, "Textile Design :  Irrgarten (Maze)", designed 1913
medium: Brush and gouache, black ink, graphite on paper, laid down
inscribed: Inscribed in black ink upper left corner of mount: JRRGARTEN
provenance: Wiener Werkstätte Archive (?); Wolfgang Ruf/Galerie Ruf, Rastatt, Germany
creditline: Museum purchase from Smithsonian Collections Acquisition and Decorative Arts Association Acquisition Funds
description: The "Irrgarten" design consists of stylized, spiky plant leaves in brown color variation.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Textile Design :  Irrgarten (Maze)", designed 1913.
designed 1913. Brush and gouache, black ink, graphite on paper, laid down. Museum purchase from Smithsonian Collections Acquisition and Decorative Arts Association Acquisition Funds. 1988-62-700.
